originalText.text: I just got quote on 10/10 and they delivered what i need to next day! Absolutely great , fantastic team and Mustafa did everything very well , he managed very smooth communication which made my process very easy . I'm very thankful to them , plus they are quite reliable !

originalText.text: If you are looking for a professional place for translation, you are here. I worked with Mustafa Cengiz he is very professional. I am so glad I chose the LInk Translations Services. Thank you.

originalText.text:
Our company is a company that offers many services including Translation service and Link Translation gets the job done for us! I get the translations done for my customers in the time they let me know it will be done sometimes quicker if they are not busy! I appreciate Mustafa for always quickly replying back to me and giving me a quote for my customer who needs their translation for MVC! They get the job done quickly, correctly and without any problem! My customers are always very happy and my business can keep getting good reviews because Link Translations always gets it right!! A special thanks to Mustafa and Link Translations for its flexibility and always working so well with our company!
Kim Dorcely

originalText.text: Very efficient work and fast response from the company via email. Would recommend！

text.text: Very efficient work and fast response from the company via email. Would recommend！

originalText.text: I needed some documents for the immigration process for my wife and daughter. They were extremely quick to respond and had my documents all translated in less than 10 hours. They were extremely friendly, very good at communicating, and fixed errors that were on the translation immediately. I’ve never had such wonderful service and such constant communication on information about everything I needed with this. They even accommodated for my wife and daughter as well. Wonderful company would use them again in the future! Highly recommend!!
